column2: SELECT TOP # s.apogee_id, s.ra, s.dec, s.glon, s.glat, s.vhelio_avg, s.vscatter, a.teff, a.teff_err, a.logg, a.logg_err, dbo.fApogeeAspcapFlagN (a.aspcapflag) , dbo.fApogeeStarFlagN (s.starflag) FROM apogeeStar s JOIN aspcapStar a on a.apstar_id = s.apstar_id JOIN apogeeObject obj on a.target_id = obj.target_id WHERE (a.aspcapflag & dbo.fApogeeAspcapFlag (#) ) = # and s.extratarg = #
